name: Mommies & Monsters
description:
Mommies & Monsters is currently in playtesting and is not complete! The price on release will be $7.99 for a text-only PDF copy of the book or $14.99 for an illustrated PDF copy of the book. The current release is not yet feature complete or final, so be aware of this before purchasing.

As stated above, Mommies & Monsters is currently in playtesting! If you'd like to be a part of organized playtests, please join Discord at https://discord.me/babybunch in order to join in. Message one of the Baby Bunch (Tegan, Emily, or Lia, whoever's online at the time) with a screenshot of your receipt in order to see the M&M playtest channels.

Mommies & Monsters is an Open Gaming License 5e-compatible supplement centering around ABDL content - that is to say, mostly diaper stuff. It also contains stuff centered around age regression (characters getting younger, specifically as a setup for an adventure or as a mishap to occur during an adventure) and (magical) gender changes in a similar vein. It does not and will not contain any sexual content.

On release, it will contain:

  • 5 new races specific to the setting
  • Rules for ABDL content and "quirks"
  • New spells related to ABDL content
  • New items related to ABDL content
  • New magical items similarly related to ABDL content
  • New monsters related to ABDL and other niche content
  • A "dungeon crawl"-styled mini-campaign

The following list of features were stretch goals and therefore may be released slightly after the base game: one additional race (chosen by early backers), age regression content, and a fully designed world including starting points for adventures.
